name: Dark ShareLaTeX
description:
Dark Layout for ShareLaTeX UI, keeping most coloured elements, like buttons and symbols.
The Editor and PDF preview are also untouched.

Best combined with dark editor theme, like twilight.
additional_info:
Changelog
  • 2014-11-04: Fix for autocomplete popup - highlighted line background and text color.
  • 2014-11-28: Fix for chat / textarea - font color changed.
  • 2015-05-12: Dark dropdowns in side menu + brighter label text color.
